Posts.Content: notimeforthis wrote: Last year I had the radiologist, surgeon and my doctor tell me to have an mri because of a mass in my right breast.  Insurance denies payment as I didn't fit the criteria (trusted my drs to know what I needed).  Had a bioposy and it was benign.  I had a mammogram done a year later and there is a new finding in the area of the bioposy.  The radiologist says it could be scar tissue and have another mammogram in 6 months.  Is the wait and see a good thing to do or should I insist on u/s? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: bioposy scar tissue? notimeforthis leaf
